body.p: In determining the effective date of IFRS 16, the IASB considered feedback received from preparers about the amount of time they would need to implement the requirements of IFRS 16 in the light of the transition requirements. The IASB also considered feedback received from both users and preparers of financial statements about the interaction of IFRS 16 with the implementation of other recently issued Standards (most notably IFRS 9 and IFRS 15).
